EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, catch up on the BigCommerce Town Hall updates you missed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Watch the September BigCommerce Town Hall to get a detailed look at the lastest product updates. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Last week, we hosted our September BigCommerce Town Hall.
During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm, CPO Jimmy Duvall, and the Product Team shared important updates about:
- Apple Pay - eBay Integration - Optimized single page checkout updates - Stencil theme platform updates - New functionality for "View Products" - Cart-level discounts updates
We've posted the video in our Town Hall library in the Community. Simply log-in to the Community to see what you missed.
Visit the Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/article/BigCommerce-Town-Halls]]>
We'll be sending out the invitation to the October Town Hall soon. We hope to see you there! Best, The BigCommerce Team
PS: Need help logging into the Community? Learn how to create an account or change your password for the Community <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Logging-in-to-the-BigCommerce-Community/]]>.
